publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3107 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to Fife Constabularyâ€”That the Parliament commends Chief Constable Peter Wilson and his officers from Fife Constabulary in policing three major events in Scotland this year, the royal graduation, the Open Golf Championship and the G8 summit; further notes that these three events, known as the three Gs, went off with the minimum of disruption, and pays tribute to those officers from Fife Constabulary who all worked effectively as a team at each event and displayed the very finest qualities of police forces throughout the United Kingdom. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Mitchell*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr David Davidson*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-3107 Congratulations to Fife Constabulary (lodged on 19 July 2005) John Scott*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-3107 Congratulations to Fife Constabulary (lodged on 19 July 2005) Iain Smith*
